item.title: ./welcome.sh
item.description: Hello stranger, My name is DimitrisV SV1SJP, I am from Greece,EU and this is my small website. On this website I will organise all the educational stuff I have created in both Greek and English. This is the very first release so expect bugs and glitches. Wishing you the best, Dimitris Vagiakakos dimitrislinuxos@protonmail.ch
item.content:
Hello stranger, My name is DimitrisV SV1SJP, I am from Greece,EU and this is my small website. On this website I will organise all the educational stuff I have created in both Greek and English. This is the very first release so expect bugs and glitches.

Wishing you the best,

Dimitris Vagiakakos dimitrislinuxos@protonmail.ch
